Package de.lases.control.validation

package de.lases.control.validation
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    AvatarValidator
    Validator for the avatar file.
    DateTimeInFutureValidator
    Validator for date inputs that validates if a given temporal (date, dateTime) is in the future compared to the system time of the server.
    EmailAddressExistsValidator
    Validator for email addresses that checks if a given email address is part of the datasource.
    EmailAddressLayoutValidator
    Validator for email addresses that checks if the given email is a valid email address.
    EmailAddressUnoccupiedValidator
    Validator for email addresses that checks if a given email address is not part of the datasource.
    ForumNameExistsValidator
    Validator for email addresses that checks if a given forum name is part of the datasource.
    PasswordValidator
    Validator for passwords that validates password after the following rules: must contain both uppercase and lowercase letters must contain numbers must contain special characters must be between 8 and 100 characters in length
    PDFValidator
    Validator for pdf files.
    URLValidator
    Validator for urls that checks if the given url is a valid url.
